.@Lagarde: The Board has approved a US$50 billion loan to support Argentina’s plan to strengthen the economy for the benefit of all Argentines. IMF Executive Board approves US$50 billion loan for Argentina w/ immediate disbursement of US$15 billion. The loan supports Argentina’s plan to restore market confidence by reducing financing needs, public debt & inflation while maintaining social spending https://t.co/1IAuLDn1es https://t.co/Zzv6tvYjCR

Today is International Day of #FamilyRemittances.
250 million people, or 3% of the global population, live outside their country of birth. 
Many of these migrants send part of their incomes to families back home. 
In 2015, migrants sent home $441 billion.
